statements: SELECT * FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT user_id, points_earned FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT points_redeemed, user_id FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE points_earned > 100;
SELECT user_id, points_earned, points_redeemed FROM loyalty_program WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program WHERE points_earned > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, points_earned, points_redeemed FROM loyalty_program WHERE points_redeemed < 50 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT user_id, points_earned FROM loyalty_program WHERE points_earned > points_redeemed AND points_redeemed < 50 ORDER BY points_earned DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(points_earned) AS max_points_earned, MIN(points_redeemed) AS min_points_redeemed FROM loyalty_program;
SELECT user_id, SUM(points_earned) AS total_points FROM loyalty_program GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_points > 500 ORDER BY total_points DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_details;
SELECT user_id, points_earned FROM loyalty_program_details ORDER BY points_earned DESC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM user_details WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT email FROM user_details WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_details WHERE points_earned > points_redeemed;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_details WHERE points_earned > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM user_details WHERE first_name LIKE 'A%' OR last_name LIKE 'B%' ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT user_id, points_earned, points_redeemed FROM loyalty_program_details WHERE points_earned < 50 AND points_redeemed > 20;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM user_details WHERE last_name = 'Smith' AND email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM user_details JOIN loyalty_program_details ON user_details.user_id = loyalty_program_details.user_id WHERE points_redeemed > 50 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_users;
SELECT user_id, username, points_earned FROM loyalty_program_users WHERE points_earned > 100;
SELECT reward_id, reward_name, points_required FROM loyalty_program_rewards ORDER BY points_required DESC;
SELECT user_id, points_earned, points_redeemed FROM loyalty_program_users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, transaction_date, points_change FROM loyalty_program_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'earn' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loyalty_program_users;
SELECT reward_name, points_required FROM loyalty_program_rewards WHERE points_required > 50;
SELECT user_id, username, points_earned - points_redeemed AS total_points FROM loyalty_program_users;
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM loyalty_program_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(points_change) AS total_points_changed FROM loyalty_program_transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, points FROM points_earned ORDER BY points DESC;
SELECT user_id, points_redeemed FROM points_redeemed WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, SUM(points) AS total_points FROM points_earned GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM points_redeemed WHERE points_redeemed > 50 ORDER BY user_id ASC;

SELECT u.username, pr.points_redeemed, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS transaction_count FROM users u JOIN points_redeemed pr ON u.user_id = pr.user_id JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id GROUP BY u.username, pr.points_redeemed ORDER BY transaction_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users
SELECT user_id, points_earned FROM loyalty_program ORDER BY points_earned DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE points > 100
SELECT user_id, reward_name FROM user_rewards JOIN rewards ON user_rewards.reward_id = rewards.reward_id
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users ORDER BY last_name ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, points_earned, points_redeemed FROM loyalty_program WHERE points_earned > 100 AND points_redeemed < 50 ORDER BY points_earned DESC;

SELECT u.first_name, u.last_name, r.reward_name, r.point_cost FROM users u JOIN user_rewards ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN rewards r ON ur.reward_id = r.reward_id ORDER BY u.last_name, r.point_cost DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, t.user_id, t.points, u.first_name, u.last_name FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id WHERE t.points > 50 ORDER BY t.transaction_date DESC, u.last_name ASC;
